title: About Me
subtitle: 25+ Years of Sales & Technology Leadership
bio: I'm a technology-focused sales executive with a unique career journey: software development → network engineering leadership → strategic sales transformation. I've led diverse global teams across the US, Europe, and Asia, scaling IoT business from $225M to $750M and pioneering innovative sales models that drive measurable revenue growth.
quote: Do not confuse hard work with results.

highlights.title: Network Engineering
highlights.description: Led $30M network engineering operations at Fannie Mae with 40% cost reduction through innovative automation.

highlights.title: Global Sales Leadership
highlights.description: Managed 15+ person teams across 6 countries, driving consistent growth in IoT partnerships and market expansion.

highlights.title: Revenue Scaling
highlights.description: Scaled Cisco IoT business from $225M to $750M by pioneering sell-through models and building 75-partner ecosystem generating $50M in new bookings.

highlights.title: Strategic Partnerships
highlights.description: Built alliances with AWS, Snowflake, Google Cloud to expand market reach and create new revenue streams.

highlights.title: AI/ML Expertise
highlights.description: Deep technical foundation in networking, IoT, AI/ML, cloud solutions combined with sales execution acumen.

highlights.title: Fractional Leadership
highlights.description: Help startups and SMBs transform sales organizations without the full-time cost through strategic fractional engagement.
